pkgmetadata.longdescription: Constantly==========A library that provides symbolic constant support.It includes collections and constants with text, numeric, and bit flag values.Originally ``twisted.python.constants`` from the `Twisted <https://twistedmatrix.com/>`_ project.Tests-----To run tests:: $ toxThis will run tests on Python 2.7, 3.3, 3.4, and PyPy, as well as doing coverage and pyflakes checks.
